comment: How did I miss Hereditary? This movie is excellent. This is confident horror, where they want you to look at it while most horror movies want you to see as little as possible. Thats why its always jumps cares and quick cuts, but here, the longer you see it, the scarier it becomes and the way it moves in and out of these scares is very well done and really engrossing.
